overview: Following the real ghost hunting expeditions of four twenty-something Beverly Hills women, BHGC flips the script on horror’s most widely perpetuated clichés — the dumb, bumbling, frightened female — putting the quartet in charge of their paranormal investigations, with undaunted panache. And in true Beverly Hills fashion, the ladies do it with a certain savoir faire.
tagline: Who says you can’t ghost hunt in stilettos?
title: Beverly Hills Ghost Club
